pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Estimation of Cluster Parameters // Estimating parameters of site clusters on 2D 3D square lattice with various lattice sizes, relative fractions of open sites (occupation probability), iso- anisotropy, von Neumann Moore (1,d)-neighborhoods, described by Moskalev P.V. et al. (2011) arXiv:1105.2334v1.
